title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 458.4 - Investigation of complaints
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 458.4 - Investigation of complaints

State Regulations
(a) A pharmacy benefit manager shall respond to any complaint that is forwarded by the department to the pharmacy benefit manager within fifteen business days. A pharmacy benefit manager may request additional time to respond to a complaint. (b) Any response filed by the pharmacy benefit manager pursuant to this section will be shared with the complainant. (c) The information filed by a pharmacy benefit manager in response to a complaint shall be filed electronically. (d) No pharmacy benefit manager may take any retaliatory action in response to the filing of a complaint with the department, even if the department resolves the complaint in the pharmacy benefit manager's favor.
